_header: The ax was sharp the stock was hard
_description: A couplet (or couplets) of warning based on the year 1381 — couplets

OxfStJohn209.Transcription:
The ax was sharpe the stokke was hardein the xiiij yere of kyng
                    Richarde

CULDd142.Transcription:
Man be war and be no foolþenke apon þe ax and of þe
                    stoolþe stool was hard þe ax was scharpþe iiij
                    ȝere of kyng Richard
CULDd142.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Historical Poems of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         New York: Columbia UP, 1959: 54.
 Bad Key: Dobson1970: 305.

BLCottCleoCVIII.Transcription:
þe ex was scharp þe stok was hardþe fowrt y ȝere
                    of kyng rychard
